scripts.report:merge: if ls cypress/report/*.json 1> /dev/null 2>&1; then npx mochawesome-merge cypress/report/*.json > cypress/report/report.json; else echo 'Nenhum arquivo de report para merge'; fi
scripts.report:generate: if ls cypress/report/*.json 1> /dev/null 2>&1; then npx marge cypress/report/*.json -f report -o cypress/report --inline; else echo 'Nenhum arquivo de report encontrado'; fi
